sentences.en: ‘Clear off!’ he yelled.
sentences.cn: “走开！”他喊道。

sentences.en: a clear June morning
sentences.cn: 6月的一个晴朗早晨

sentences.en: a crystal clear mountain lake
sentences.cn: 清澈见底的山间湖泊

sentences.en: Adam cleared away and washed up.
sentences.cn: 亚当收拾好桌子，洗了碗。

sentences.en: After shampooing, always rinse the hair several times in clear water.
sentences.cn: 每次用完洗发剂后都要用清水将头发冲洗几次。

sentences.en: But, once you have and you have a clear conscience, release it.
sentences.cn: 一旦你清晰地感觉到良心的谴责的话，就放松点儿吧。

sentences.en: clear instructions
sentences.cn: 明确的指示

sentences.en: Dad cleared a space (= moved things so there was room ) in the garage for Jim’s tools.
sentences.cn: 爸爸在车库里清理出一个地方来放吉姆的工具。

sentences.en: Dig over any ground that is clear of crops and plants.
sentences.cn: 把没种庄稼和植物的土地都深翻一遍。

sentences.en: He had clear blue eyes and a jutting chin.
sentences.cn: 他有一双清澈的蓝眼睛和凸出的下巴。

sentences.en: He has clear blue eyes and a dazzling smile.
sentences.cn: 他有一双清澈的蓝眼睛和一脸灿烂的微笑。

sentences.en: He writes crystal clear (= very easy to understand ) prose.
sentences.cn: 他写的散文通俗易懂。

sentences.en: his moods blew up suddenly out of a clear sky.
sentences.cn: 他突然勃然大怒，完全莫名其妙。

sentences.en: If I catch you smoking again, you’re grounded. Do I make myself clear (= used when you are angry ) ?
sentences.cn: 如果再让我发现你抽烟，我就罚你不准出门。我的话你听清楚了吗？

sentences.en: If you don’t understand, it’s best to say so and get things clear .
sentences.cn: 如果你不明白，那就最好照直说并把事情弄清楚。

sentences.en: It was clear Cohen didn't understand what Millard was driving at.
sentences.cn: 看得出科恩并不明白米勒德想说什么。

sentences.en: It was not yet clear how the rudder had sheared off.
sentences.cn: 还不清楚船舵是如何断裂的。

sentences.en: It’s Kelly’s turn to clear the table (= remove the dirty plates, forks etc ) .
sentences.cn: 轮到凯利收拾桌子了。

sentences.en: It’s the clearest guide I’ve used.
sentences.cn: 我从没用过这么清晰易懂的指南。

sentences.en: My own view is absolutely clear. What I did was right.
sentences.cn: 我自己的观点非常清楚。我做的事是正确的。

sentences.en: Our therapists will show you how to clear your mind of worries.
sentences.cn: 我们的治疗师会教你如何消除心中的忧虑。

sentences.en: People use scientific terms with no clear idea of their meaning.
sentences.cn: 人们使用科学术语，但并非很清楚其含义。

sentences.en: Perhaps I tried to cover too much and didn’t make myself clear (= express myself well ) .
sentences.cn: 可能是我涉及的内容太多，没有表达清楚。

sentences.en: She felt that her thinking was clearer now.
sentences.cn: 她感到自己的思路现在清晰些了。

sentences.en: Snowplows have been out clearing the roads.
sentences.cn: 扫雪机已经出动，去清扫路面了。

sentences.en: Stewart was trying to clear a path for the stretcher.
sentences.cn: 斯图尔特在努力给担架开路。

sentences.en: The close-up photography and commentary are clear and unambiguous.
sentences.cn: 那组特写照片和附带的评论一目了然，毫无含糊之处。

sentences.en: The hostage release could clear the decks for war.
sentences.cn: 人质的获释可能会为发动战争扫清障碍。

sentences.en: The question wasn’t very clear.
sentences.cn: 这问题不是很清楚。

sentences.en: The rabbis try to steer clear of political questions.
sentences.cn: 拉比们努力避开政治问题。

sentences.en: The rash has finally cleared.
sentences.cn: 皮疹最终消失了。

sentences.en: the ruling could be enough to clear the way for impeachment proceedings.
sentences.cn: 作出的裁决足以为弹劾诉讼扫清道路。

sentences.en: the Russian staff practice of sending radio messages and orders in clear.
sentences.cn: 俄罗斯参谋机构用普通文字发送无线电信息和命令。

sentences.en: The skies were clear and blue.
sentences.cn: 天空晴朗，一片蔚蓝。

sentences.en: the spokesman released a statement attempting to clear his client's name.
sentences.cn: 发言人发布了一则声明，想以此澄清委托人的名声。

sentences.en: They made it clear who is now running the show.
sentences.cn: 他们清楚地表明了现在是谁在掌控一切。

sentences.en: Whatever its obscurities, the poem was clear on at least one count.
sentences.cn: 这首诗再怎么晦涩，至少有一点是清楚的。

sentences.en: When I think about these unique assets, I get a clear picture of what WHO must do, what we can do, and what we should not do.
sentences.cn: 当我想到这些独特的资产时，我对世界卫生组织必须做什么，我们能够做什么和我们应该做什么有了一个清晰的蓝图。

离开，走开：离开一个地方，通常快速地
为（某活动，某目的）做好准备
完全透明的；[喻]极其明白，十分清楚
用普通文字，不使用密码
不受阻碍；以内宽计算；用普通文字

to make somewhere emptier or tidier by removing things from it

if the weather, sky, mist etc clears, it becomes better and there is more sun
